mapper.sql: id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, del_flag, name, sort, picture, member_level_id, registration_start_time, registration_end_time, activity_start_time, activity_end_time, activity_description, activity_introduction, activity_title, discount_price_ratio, enable
mapper.select: WITH RECURSIVE parentIds (id,parent_id, `name`, `level`) AS ( SELECT DISTINCT pgc.`id`, pgc.parent_id, pgc.name, pgc.`level` FROM am_seckill `as` INNER JOIN am_activity_rel_activity_goods aarag ON `as`.id = aarag.`activity_id` AND `as`.`del_flag` = 0 AND `as`.`enable` = 1 AND `as`.activity_start_time = #{activityStartTime} AND aarag.`verify_status` = 3 AND aarag.`del_flag` = 0 INNER JOIN pm_goods pg ON pg.id = aarag.`goods_id` AND pg.`publish_status` = 1 INNER JOIN pm_goods_category pgc ON pg.goods_category_id = pgc.id UNION ALL SELECT pgc.id,pgc.parent_id,pgc.name, pgc.level FROM parentIds AS temp LEFT JOIN pm_goods_category AS pgc ON temp.parent_id = pgc.id WHERE pgc.del_flag=0 ) SELECT DISTINCT id,`name` FROM parentIds WHERE `level` = 1

SELECT pg.id AS goodsId, pg.`name` AS goodsName, pg.`subtitle`, pg.icon, SUM(aargs.activity_stock) AS activityStock, SUM(aargs.sales_volume) AS salesVolume, MIN(aargs.activity_price) AS sellPrice, MIN(pgs.`sell_price`) AS linePrice, `as`.`activity_end_time` FROM am_seckill `as` INNER JOIN am_activity_rel_activity_goods aarag ON `as`.id = aarag.`activity_id` AND `as`.`del_flag` = 0 AND `as`.`enable` = 1 AND `as`.activity_start_time = #{activityStartTime} AND aarag.`verify_status` = 3 AND aarag.`del_flag` = 0 INNER JOIN pm_goods pg ON pg.id = aarag.`goods_id` AND pg.`publish_status` = 1 INNER JOIN am_activity_rel_goods_sku aargs ON aarag.`id` = aargs.`rel_id` AND aargs.`del_flag` = 0 INNER JOIN pm_goods_sku pgs ON pgs.id = aargs.`sku_id` AND pgs.`del_flag` = 0
INNER JOIN pm_goods_category pgc ON pgc.id = pg.goods_category_id INNER JOIN pm_goods_category pgc1 ON pgc1.id = pgc.parent_id
AND pgc1.parent_id = #{categoryId}
GROUP BY `as`.`activity_end_time`, pg.`id`

SELECT DISTINCT `as`.create_time AS activityTime FROM am_seckill `as`
`as`.del_flag = 0 AND `as`.enable = 1 AND `as`.activity_start_time >= #{startDateTime} AND `as`.activity_start_time <= #{endDateTime} AND EXISTS( SELECT aarag.id FROM am_activity_rel_activity_goods aarag WHERE aarag.`activity_id` = `as`.id AND aarag.del_flag = 0 AND aarag.verify_status = 3 )
ORDER BY `as`.create_time DESC

select ,( CASE WHEN ( now( ) < registration_start_time ) THEN '待开始' WHEN ( now( ) > registration_end_time ) THEN '已结束' ELSE '报名中' END ) AS registration_status, ( CASE WHEN ( now( ) < activity_start_time ) THEN '待开始' WHEN ( now( ) > activity_end_time ) THEN '已结束' ELSE '活动中' END ) AS activity_status from am_seckill where id = #{id}
